tweets.text:
We use around 6.8 billion #SingleUsePlastic straws, cotton buds and stirrers in England, every year. 

Not anymore. 

Businesses will now no longer be able to supply these to customers, unless it's for medical reasons.  

Find out more: https://t.co/zvLI9ApVkp 

#PassOnPlastic https://t.co/IdMmuIvypv

@Colne_Valley @ColneCAN @EnvAgency Something is very wrong here, and we need answers – this is grave cause for concern. It should also be an opportunity for the @EnvAgency to show it takes its role seriously. I wonder if it will?
@Feargal_Sharkey @RobertLindsay @BucksCouncil @BCCountryParks @Hillingdon

One of the local river fly monitors has recorded a score of zero at #DenhamCountryPark. This is alarming because the site has never previously been below 9 since recording started in February 2017. @ColneCAN has asked the @EnvAgency to investigate as a matter of urgency.

Ok
1. Pass Environment Bill ASAP & establish legally binding targets

tweets.text: Great progress being made on the £30m Burton-upon-Trent #flood defence scheme which is due for completion next spring. Sections will be finished progressively and made accessible to the public. Pics show embankment near golf course and Fairway estate. https://t.co/DEE7cugfl4

The historic concrete culvert in a tributary of the Torridge represented a barrier to fish movement. The old quarry track was no longer used and the landowner agreed to the culverts removal, opening up >2km of watercourse upstream to fish @EnvAgency #WEG #TRRP https://t.co/8096LIr5kJ

Instead of focusing on helping LOCAL work by volunteers, landowners & businesses to improve habitat: especially our precious rivers & wetlands.

Work continues on the lock in Boston. 

The chamber has been emptied of water so a full assessment could take place. 

Any necessary maintenance is now being carried out before the lock is re-filled👍 #Lincolnshire #Flood https://t.co/vsh18V0EMB

It’s a packed agenda tonight - from sources of #flooding & communicating risk to awareness of hazards & the necessary steps to keep Wardens & the #community safe. Great to see so many people in attendance 😊 #CPYorks @EnvAgencyYNE @SimonHildonEA https://t.co/MLSBoDa5BA

The Green Recovery Challenge Fund is open now for applications 🌳🐤Grants from £50k to £5million are available for England based #nature projects to kick-start the #GreenRecovery from  #COVID19. 
 
Apply at https://t.co/HZ1Yb3DpFF  @DefraGovUK @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency https://t.co/PsHntjOjUv

I talked to @BenGoldsmith about his Somerset rewilding project, @EnvAgency enforcement and what @BorisJohnson  and @michaelgove think about bringing back long lost species... 
https://t.co/l2yUiGJzN1 https://t.co/uaaiBP27xv

tweets.text: @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgencyAnglia Thanks for responding so quickly - but I actually want the national map, as previously on Defra MagicMap

@EnvAgency Thank you for responding so quickly.  However, it takes me to a link which goes back to MagicMap which no longer shows the data.  May I ask why the (excellent) map is no longer available?   An FOI takes 20 working days and does not allow one to search on own terms.

This video shows just how easy it is to create customised #maps of elevation using @EnvAgency
#LiDAR using the Maploom App. 
https://t.co/L3zLCPVrDd

@RosieP4 Good morning - here is the link to the replacement - Data Services Platform: https://t.co/7YdQEss2BL if you are unable to locate information you require - please email in for an FOI:  enquiries@environment-agency.gov.uk - Eileen

It’s not just #sewage that is killing #rivers it’s poor land management too. This is the Glottenham Stream in the #HighWeald #AONB with a heavy burden of #soil run-off after a moderate amount of rain. @EnvAgencySE @SE_Rivers_Trust @SussexWildlife @highweald https://t.co/TmSH18z4r8
@RosieP4 You need @EnvAgencyAnglia, Rosie. Perhaps they can help. Peter

@GeorgeFreemanMP @EnvAgency @WVANorfolk @NFUEastAnglia Really George? Maybe putting so much visitor infrastructure in the flood plain is the real problem. Flood plains flood (clue is in the name) & there is an inherent risk of building in flood plains.
All of #Somerset's major rivers are "polluted beyond legal limits", according to new data released by @EnvAgencySW: https://t.co/lTdoNr8nsH #LDReporter
A Norfolk nature reserve warden has labelled the Environment Agency “incapable” after another damaging bout of flooding. https://t.co/U3v8V5Kt8r

Like many of these huge quangos, the @EnvAgency has become too
⚠️centralised
⚠️bureaucratic
⚠️anti-business

Instead of focusing on helping LOCAL work by volunteers, landowners & businesses to improve habitat: especially our precious rivers & wetlands.

@WVANorfolk @NFUEastAnglia https://t.co/KKT9nbv5nz
Thanks for the coverage, @truckerworld. #wastecrime #Northamptonshire #Brackley #Edmonton https://t.co/jf8h0HKPdb

Meanwhile in Herefordshire we await the actions of the Nutrient Management Board. So far it has failed to stop the destruction of the River Wye SAC SSSI.
It meets tomorrow but where and when is a mystery. We have the agenda but no board papers. @EnvAgency @WGEnviroAgri https://t.co/KAMp80UBrt

@UllswaterCic @EnvAgencyNW It's truly beautiful! So, why wouldn't @EnvAgencyNW consider this as option just over the high street for the River Kent. Instead it's concrete walls and removal of trees for Kendal!

Want to find out why #Salmon are leaping earlier than usual at the #RiverSevern weir in #Shrewsbury? 

Listen to @ChrisBaingerEA's interview ➡️ https://t.co/U0ErFC11B5 (1hr 10mins in). 

If you spot salmon in the river post your photos using #SpawningWatch so we can monitor them. https://t.co/lR8czeYE71

Our amazing new online virtual consultation room for the Tadcaster Flood Alleviation Scheme has gone live. Click here to see options & give your feedback: https://t.co/RQJ5ohhfua
Please share with family & friends.
Details also being posted out with Tadcaster Today newsletter. https://t.co/kleBgq0W8p

Rivers are vital to our environment. We respond to an environmental incident every 45 minutes to stop and reverse damage to our rivers. 
 
Let's work together to protect them. 
 
#WorldRiversDay https://t.co/0d3EzXd2ic

යොවුන් පාර්ලිමේන්තු මන්ත්‍රීවරුන් 
පරිසරය ආරක්ෂා කිරීමට සක්‍රීය දායක කරගැනීම පිළිබදව වැඩසටහනක් තරුණ හා ක්‍රීඩා අමාත්‍ය නාමල් රාජපක්ෂ මහතාගේ ප්‍රධානත්වයෙන් අද (30) පැවති අතර මේ සදහා සම්පත් දායකයින් ලෙස මහාචාර්ය සරත් කොටගම,ආචාර්ය සමන් ගමගේ,ජනක බණ්ඩාරනායක යන මහත්වරුන් සහභාගි වුනා. https://t.co/MnHtb4buQ8

Have you seen anything that could help with our investigations? 

If so, please report it to 0800 807060📞 #pollution https://t.co/0rrPMCHyFa

Our ports could be hiding #WasteCrime activity. 
 
Waste criminals try to profit from selling and exporting waste abroad, leaving it for someone else to deal with and potentially harming the environment. 
 
Our port officers work to stop this waste from travelling abroad 👇 https://t.co/vgNsZEAPtV
